short_description: nomadic goat is a hair salon based in portland, maine, united states.
long_description: nomadic goat is a minimal, clean air, + eco conscious studio. our intimate little studio offers a privatized one on one service setting specializing in intuitive haircutting + natural brow shaping suited to each individual. at nomadic goat we always want our clients to feel comfortable in their own skin. through exploration + empathy we work to elevate our clients so that they are able to see their true beauty. we believe beauty is a feeling + we want to pass that feeling on to everyone we meet. homophobia, transphobia, racism, sexism, ableism + ageism will not be tolerated. we do not have a phone number attached to the salon. if you need anything at all please email us ahoy@nomadicgoat.com or send us a message on our instagram page.
